website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Frequent Trail is a neutral running shoe that is designed specifically for light trail runs. It incorporates technical features that deliver lasting comfort, protection, and support for optimal performance. This shoe is a good choice for runners and athletes seeking a lightweight, yet durable running companion.
pros: Numerous runners said that the Asics Frequent Trail is fast and lightweight
It offers a mix of comfort and stability, according to several users
This shoe is built with just enough padding, based on reviews
Some wearers mention that this running partner is breathable
The overall quality of the shoe gained favor from a lot of commenters
Many satisfied consumers confirm that this shoe is durable
It is responsive, several buyers observed
A few reviewers have testified that this shoe is also suitable for walking and hiking
cons: The Asics Frequent Trail is a bit narrow, some testers claimed
A couple of runners disliked the short shoelaces
One user noted that this shoe does not provide decent traction on wet surfaces
A runner complained that the upper material rubs on top of his feet, causing pain

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Fit Now
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is a size 8 and when it comes to trainers, the size up could be 8 1/2, 9 , upwards depending. I chanced on size 8 1/2 before i settled on size 9 which was a relief. The size 8 1/2 in asics was just too tight and narrow for me, and i had to exchange them for a 9. The 9 is a perfect fit for me now and i have yet to try them out properly. I like Asics because they are a tougher and more put together runner shoe, especially underneath the shoe. My pair of Airs are collapsing after a few months wear and tear. I am sure that these will outlast them.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable after break in
customer_reviews.text: Usual quality from asics. Comfortable, except for the heel on one foot, which rubbed until the shoes were broken in. I have the dark blue ones, and my Mrs say they look like kids shoes, but I find them comfortable and a bit different to my usual all black ones.
customer_reviews.author: Man in shed

customer_reviews.title: comfortable from the first wear. Lightweight hiking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as lightweight hiking shoes and even on the first outing they felt like they didnt need any wearing in. Ive done a number of 5-10 mile walks in them on pavements, grass, gravel, mud etc and they are comfy, give support and are light. I was surprised at them being so comfortable and not causing hot spots or blisters.
customer_reviews.author: freakSTATIC

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I still have my old sonoma’s, amazingly sturdy and resilient shoe. I regularly fire them in the washing machine. These are even comfier again :-) Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: aineshopping

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for gym use plus outdoor running in all conditions and they are probably the best trainer I’ve come across over the past 15yrs after trying out most different sports brands. Highly recommended. Plus the fact they also look good is just another reason ad definitely purchase another pair in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Davison

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good support and cushioning for long walks. They looked even nicer than in the picture upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers!
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are really comfortable, I have worn them all day for work with no complaints. A good buy at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daily 30 minute 'lockdown exercise' now the gym is closed - my gym shoes weren't up to running on pavements/roads/fields. I'm not an expert on running shoes but they seem fine to me after daily use for around 3 weeks. They look good too - way more stylish than their owner!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for trail running but I also use for tarmac. I will be getting another pair when these have done their miles.
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: Half size bigger than 'normal'
customer_reviews.text: I normally take a size 10.5 for a 'snug' fit, these are definitely a half size bigger but still comfortable
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable brand
customer_reviews.text: My 4th pair of this brand, but my first trail pair. I am becoming a big fan. Great quality. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Rhodri Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Nice trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. Took a 5K trail in their stride. Going well so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Trainers were a perfect fit and arrived earlier than expected. Good clear description, I’d have no problem ordering from this seller again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Lack of quality
customer_reviews.text: For ASICS they seem cheap quality would not recommend, not alot of support flimsy
customer_reviews.author: t doyle

customer_reviews.title: Fell the 1st time I wore them 🙄
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable and fell for the first time ever in them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Frequent Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The frequent trail is a trail shoe for low-intensity runners. Durable and robust sole; excellent value for money. Features: robust sole; lasting eva; internal molded heel support; exterior in durable mesh.
feature_bullets: Synthetic Leather and Mesh Upper- Breathable comfort that blocks out dirt and debris.
Synthetic Leather Overlays- Promotes a secure, locked down feel.
Traditional Lacing System with Discrete Eyelets- Adjustable fit that disperses lace tension evenly.
Reinforced Toe Cap- Offers protection against rocks and debris.
Heel Tab- Promotes easy on/off wear.
